mapper.select: select as_id, u_id, as_content, as_time, g_id, es_1, es_2, es_3 from assesses where as_id = #{asId}
mapper.insert: insert into assesses(u_id, as_content, as_time, g_id, es_1, es_2, es_3) values (#{uId}, #{asContent}, #{asTime}, #{gId}, #{es1}, #{es2}, #{es3})

insert into assesses(u_id, as_content, as_time, g_id, es_1, es_2, es_3) values
(#{entity.uId}, #{entity.asContent}, #{entity.asTime}, #{entity.gId}, #{entity.es1}, #{entity.es2}, #{entity.es3})

insert into assesses(u_id, as_content, as_time, g_id, es_1, es_2, es_3) values
(#{entity.uId}, #{entity.asContent}, #{entity.asTime}, #{entity.gId}, #{entity.es1}, #{entity.es2}, #{entity.es3})
on duplicate key update u_id = values(u_id), as_content = values(as_content), as_time = values(as_time), g_id = values(g_id), es_1 = values(es_1), es_2 = values(es_2), es_3 = values(es_3)
mapper.update:
update assesses
u_id = #{uId},
as_content = #{asContent},
as_time = #{asTime},
g_id = #{gId},
es_1 = #{es1},
es_2 = #{es2},
es_3 = #{es3},
where as_id = #{asId}
